one of many types of sea fish, especially sea bream, or the flesh of these fish eaten as food: The fishmonger sells fresh oysters, squid, porgies, cod, and clams. You need six whole porgy or other small whole fish, cleaned and gutted. The porgy she made was simply prepared with parsley, lemon, and garlic.
